main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Cincinnati, Ohio on 8 November 1967.
interesting points: The observer noted the object changed the atmosphere when it appeared,The object was described as egg-shaped and very bright,The sighting lasted for about 6 minutes,The object was initially thought to be a satellite, but its behavior contradicted this belief,There were no photographs taken during the sighting.
witness description: The witness observed the phenomenon from the ground and reported it had no discernible noise.
